description: Repairs to coal vault including cap on chute.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
(2010/6631/P). Granted (Feb 28 2011) - Full Planning Permission. Erection of a mansard roof extension to create living space/third floor level inc. 2 x dormers to front and 2 x windows to rear roof slopes to dwelling (Class C3).

(2010/6633/L). Granted (Feb 28 2011) - Listed Building Consent. Erection of a mansard roof extension to create living space/third floor level inc. 2 x dormers to front and 2 x windows to rear roof slopes and new stairs and ensuite bathroom to dwelling (Class C3).

(2012/5112/L). Granted (Nov 7 2012) - Approval of Details (Listed Building). Details pursuant to condition 4 (a) new windows, b) staircase, c) balusters and handrail) and condition 5 (sample panels of brick and slate) of listed building consent granted on 28/02/2011 (Ref 2010/6633/L) for erection of a mansard roof extension to create living space/third floor level inc. 2 x dormers to front and 2 x windows to rear roof slopes and new stairs and ensuite bathroom to dwelling (Class C3).

(2016/5469/L). Withdrawn (Jun 6 2017)- Listed Building Consent. The replacement of broken lintels with steel beams.

(2017/4047/L). Granted (Dec 1 2017) - Listed Building Consent. Retrospective consent for replacement lintels on front elevation.

(2017/4055/L). Granted (Dec 1 2017) - Listed Building Consent. Take down existing failing brick retaining wall and reconstruct, tying the new wall back to the existing vaults. Adjacent drain repairs.

(2021/6194/L). Withdrawn (Jul 12 2022)- Listed Building Consent. Listed Building Consent of the reduction in depth of the basement and ground floor lintels on the front elevation by 40mm and replacement of lightwell wall at the front of the property.
